perturbation.original_text: Licensor: PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT Licensee THE HENRY FILM AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION
perturbation.changed_text: Content Provider: PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT Customer: THE HENRY FILM AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION
perturbation.explanation: Replaced 'Licensor' with 'Content Provider' and 'Licensee' with 'Customer'. These terms are similar but not strictly equivalent, creating ambiguity about the precise nature of the parties' roles and responsibilities, especially concerning liability and obligations.

perturbation.original_text: SHARED REVENUE: In lieu of PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT granting a 10 year Exclusive Content License to THE HENRY FILM AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION, THE HENRY FILM ANDENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION agrees to share 10% of the net revenue from any and all advertising sales, Syndication Fees and Licensing fees generated from all television shows, DVD Magazines, Internet Streaming Video Television Shows, Television Shorts, Radio Shows, Radio Shorts, Cell Phone Video Clips, Caller ID Video Clips, Promotional Commercials, Websites, Streaming Video Commercials, Streaming Video Highlight Shows, 24 Hour Nostalgia Sports Network, DVD Program Package, Television Show Series, stock footage library, and print promotional posters, created and or produced with any content provided by PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT.
perturbation.changed_text: SHARED REVENUE: In lieu of PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT granting a 10 year Exclusive Content Permit to THE HENRY FILM AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION, THE HENRY FILM ANDENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION agrees to share 10% of the net revenue from any and all advertising sales, Syndication Fees and Licensing fees generated from all television shows, DVD Magazines, Internet Streaming Video Television Shows, Television Shorts, Radio Shows, Radio Shorts, Cell Phone Video Clips, Caller ID Video Clips, Promotional Commercials, Websites, Streaming Video Commercials, Streaming Video Highlight Shows, 24 Hour Nostalgia Sports Network, DVD Program Package, Television Show Series, stock footage library, and print promotional posters, created and or produced with any content provided by PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT.
perturbation.explanation: Replaced 'Content License' with 'Content Permit'. 'License' implies specific legal rights and protections, whereas 'Permit' suggests a more revocable and less legally binding agreement. This weakens the guaranteed rights initially granted to THE HENRY FILM AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION.

perturbation.original_text: EFFECT OF TERMINATION: Any termination shall be without any liability or obligation of the terminating party, other than with respect to any breach of this Agreement prior to termination. The provisions relating to property rights and confidentiality shall survive any termination or expiration of this Agreement. All revenue sharing ceases with the termination of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: EFFECT OF TERMINATION: Any termination shall be without any liability or obligation of the terminating party, other than with respect to any breach of this Understanding prior to termination. The provisions relating to ownership and secrecy shall survive any termination or expiration of this Understanding. All revenue sharing ceases with the termination of this Understanding.
perturbation.explanation: Replaced 'Agreement' with 'Understanding', 'property rights' with 'ownership' and 'confidentiality' with 'secrecy'. 'Understanding' implies a less formal, less legally binding arrangement than 'Agreement', undermining the enforceability of the termination terms. 'Ownership' is more related to who owns the brand features and other similar aspects, and replaced the 'property rights' which has a broader meaning. Similarly, replaced confidentiality with 'secrecy' which has a narrower and more casual connotation.
